document_data.name: Mountain Prince
document_data.mainbody: The '''Mountain Prince''' was a skilled [[yak-man|yikarian]] warrior inhabiting the [[World Pillar Mountains]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Description: The Mountain Prince carried scars from his many battles.
document_data.Activities: As one of the [[Seven Sages]], the Mountain Prince ruled over one of the large provinces of the [[Yikarian Empire]]â€”the [[Bronze Falcon]]. Given the Bronze Falcon's location near the [[Jungle of Monsters|dense forests found east of the World Pillar Mountains]], the Mountain Prince was mostly responsible for eliminating any threats to the Empire from that direction. He often rode at the head of his army into battle.
document_data.History: The Mountain Prince personally taught the [[Lotus Emperor]] how to use a sword. He was believed to have the Emperor's confidence.
